name: The Blue Hatchet Man (beta)
description: Run, Collect. and SLASH! This new small (but fun) game is still in beta but is very addictive.  Try your best to get the highest amount of coins and kills and slash the monster before it kills you! BUGS: the monster can sometimes spawn on you and if you run into the wall, the hatchet will go into you.  Two player is coming soon and maybe even online! enjoy!
